welcome_message_body: Welcome to Antibes, where the stunning French Riviera meets old-world charm. Known for its beautiful beaches, historic architecture, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and savor all that our enchanting city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mandelieu Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mandelieu Airport, primarily used for private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private helicopter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal for passengers to use.
